name: Web Design
description: Web design refers to the design of websites that are displayed on the internet. It usually refers to the user experience aspects of website development rather than software development

name: App Development
description: Mobile app development is the act or process by which a mobile app is developed for mobile devices, such as personal digital assistants, enterprise digital assistants or mobile phones.

name: Video Editing
description: Video editing is the process of editing segments of motion video production footage, special effects and sound recordings in the post-production process. ... The goal of editing is to manipulate these events to bring the communication closer to the original goal or target. It is a visual art.
